DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy 400 µg vaginal misoprostol per 3 hour 400 µg buccal misoprostol per 3 hour second trim termination viable pregnancy
DOC.criteria: gestational age 1224 week live fetus singleton pregnancy Bishop score < 5 uterine contraction prostaglandin allergy scar uterus uterine abnormality premature rupture membrane
